revised_title: The Extraction and Preparation of Lapis Calaminaris: A 17th Century Process
tldr: This article describes the process of digging and preparing Lapis Calaminaris, also known as zinc ore, in the 17th century. The author, Giles Pooley, provides a detailed account of the methods used to find and extract the ore, as well as the techniques employed to separate and purify it. The article also touches upon the uses of the final product, including its potential medical applications.
